meanings.definition: To make a wager or gamble on an uncertain outcome.
meanings.sent1: She betted on the horse race and won some money.
meanings.sent2: He betted on his favorite team to win the game.
meanings.sent3: Betty betted on the weather forecast being wrong, but ended up needing an umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The student betted on his luck for the exam, hoping for a miracle.
meanings.sent5: The friends betted on who could eat the most hot dogs in a minute.

meanings.definition: To stake or risk something on the outcome of a contest or event.
meanings.sent1: They betted their savings on the poker game and lost it all.
meanings.sent2: She betted her prized possession on the basketball match.
meanings.sent3: The cat betted on catching the elusive mouse, but it outsmarted him.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur betted his entire business on the success of the new product.
meanings.sent5: The explorer betted his life on finding the hidden treasure in the jungle.
